entry.title: My First Blog!
entry.content:
My First Blog

Prince 2022/5/15

Welcome!

Introduction

This is my first blog. I want to use it to record my codes, other learning computer process and so on. I will update it irregularly.

My connections

e-mail: 3190105303@zju.edu.cn

Github: https://github.com/wys0912

Blog: https://wys0912.github.io

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
